Name: Twister
Message: Party members will have a twister appear beneat them.

Name: Fireball
Message: A single party member will have a fireball the party will have to soak.

Name: Death Sentence
Message: Main Tank will be dealt heavy damage.

Name: Generate
Message: A random damage dealer will be targetted for Hatch.

Name: Liquid Hell
Message: A random target will be targetted for persistent fire splashes.
